cab.content: 333THIS DOCUUSNT IS THE PROPERTY OF HIS BRITANNIC MAJESTY'S GOVERNMENT. SECRET. COPY NO. *VCoP.54 (36). CABINET. TRADE WITH ITALY. I think that my colleagues will "be interested to see the following particulars of our trade with Italy during January, 1935 and 1936, so far as they are available from the information published in the Monthly Trade - Accounts:- 1935. 1936. Total imports from Italy........... 630,878 23,550 Exports of all United Kingdom goods ........................... 755,291 39,637 Exports of imported merchandise ... 128,600 1,076 true The import figures probably fall short of the/total "by about 5%, and the exports of United Kingdom goods by about lO/o. W.R.Board of Trade, 20th February, 1936.
